extensionDescription.message: Kontroluj swoje ciasteczka! Automatycznie usuwaj nieużywane ciasteczka z zamkniętych kart, zostawiając tylko te, które chcesz.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Auto-delete unused cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Wyczyść teraz, włącznie z otwartymi kartami
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs

noRulesText.message: Brak reguł pasujących do tej domeny

welcomeMessage.message: Cześć! W czasie tej sesji, Cookie AutoDelete usunął $sessionDeleted$ ciasteczek, a od instalacji $totalDeleted$!
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.

reasonKeepOpenTab.message: Zachowane z powodu obecności otwartych kart z *.$mainDomain$
reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.google.com

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Wyczyszczone z powodu czyszczenia przy starcie oraz braku $hostname$ na białej/szarej liście
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Wyczyszczone z powodu czyszczenia na starcie oraz obecności $matchedExpression$ na szarej liście
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and *.google.com is in the Greylist

reasonCleanNoList.message: Wyczyszczone z powodu braku $hostname$ na białej/szarej liście
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists

reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists or in any open tabs

reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White/Grey lists and also open tabs were ignored

reviewLinkMessage.message: Dzięki za wypróbowanie Cookie AutoDelete. Jeśli ci się podoba, proszę o recenzję.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

activeModeText.message: Włączyć automatyczne czyszczenie? Opóźnienie przed czyszczeniem:
activeModeText.description: Enable Automatic Cleaning? Delay Before Cleaning:

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: Pokaż ilość ciasteczek z tej domeny
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Wyczyść ciasteczka z otwartych kart przy starcie
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs

localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.message: Jednoczesne włączenie czyszczenia localStorage i obsługi kontenerów kart w Firefoksie może powodować niepożądane efekty uboczne z powodu ograniczeń API
localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.description: Enabling both Localstorage Cleanup and Container Tabs might cause some unwanted side effects due to API Limitations

toGreyListText.message: Dodaj do szarej listy (czyść przy restarcie)
toGreyListText.description: Add to Greylist (Clean on Browser Restart)

exportURLSTitle.message:
Do nazwy eksportowanego pliku dodana będzie aktualna data.
Masz problem z pobraniem pliku?  Kliknij prawym klawiszem na przycisk i wybierz 'Zapisz element docelowy jako...'.
exportURLSTitle.description:
A timestamp will be appended to the filename on export.
Having trouble downloading?  Right-Click this button and click 'Save Link As...' to download.

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Przełącz by wyłączyć automatyczne czyszczenie (tryb ręczny)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Przełącz by włączyć automatyczne czyszczenie (tryb automatyczny)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

toggleNotificationText.message: Przełącz, aby włączyć lub wyłączyć powiadomienia
toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications

hstsAlarmText.message: Show notification, when HSTS tracking is likely to be performed
hstsAlarmText.description: Show notification, when HSTS tracking is likely to be performed

dntHeaderSendText.message: Send Do-Not-Track header to tell servers not to track my browser
dntHeaderSendText.description: Send Do-Not-Track header to tell servers not to track my browser

ecLocalStorageText.message: Clear Local Storage and Session Storage
ecLocalStorageText.description: Clear Local Storage and Session Storage

ecClearOnTabCloseText.message: Automatically delete Evercookies after closing the browser tab (Auto-Clean mode)
ecClearOnTabCloseText.description: Automatically delete Evercookies after closing the browser tab (Auto-Clean mode)

ecClearOnDomainChangeText.message: Automatically delete Evercookies after a domain change in Auto-Clean mode
ecClearOnDomainChangeText.description: Automatically delete Evercookies after a domain change

ecClearOnStartupText.message: Automatically delete Evercookies on startup in Auto-Clean mode
ecClearOnStartupText.description: Automatically delete Evercookies on startup in Auto-Clean mode

ecAutoModeDisableText.message: Toggle to disable automatic Evercookie cleanup (manual mode)
ecAutoModeDisableText.description: Toggle to disable automatic Evercookie cleanup (manual mode)

ecAutoModeEnableText.message: Toggle to enable automatic Evercookie cleanup (automatic mode)
ecAutoModeEnableText.description: Toggle to enable automatic Evercookie cleanup (automatic mode)

hstsTrackingButtonText.message: Toggle to enable or disable HSTS-tracking notifications
hstsTrackingButtonText.description: Toggle to enable or disable HSTS-tracking notifications

evercookieCleanupText.message: Clear all Evercookies, but keep cookies from open tabs
evercookieCleanupText.description: Clear all Evercookies, but keep cookies from open tabs

evercookieCleanupTabsText.message: Clear all Evercookies, include open tabs
evercookieCleanupTabsText.description: Clear all Evercookies, include open tabs

evercookieCleanupTitleText.message: Run Evercookie cleanup now, include them from open tabs
evercookieCleanupTitleText.description: Run Evercookie cleanup now, include them from open tabs

searchECTitleText.message: Try to find Evercookies on this Domain
searchECTitleText.description: Try to find Evercookies on this Domain

evercookieCleanupPopupText.message: Clear all Evercookies, except from open tabs
evercookieCleanupPopupText.description: Clear all Evercookies, except from open tabs

cookieCleanupTitleText.message: Run cleanup now, exclude cookies from open tabs
cookieCleanupTitleText.description: Run cleanup now, exclude cookies from open tabs

hstsNotPreventNotificationText.message: Prevention can be activated in settings
hstsNotPreventNotificationText.description: Prevention can be activated in settings
